input.description: In case use case invocation resulted in error. Error message that need to be updated on ticket.
Optionally required to set the workinfo of the ticket with success details.This will be visible to end user in SRM
Optionally required to set the workinfo of the ticket with failure details. This will be visible to end user in SRM

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="node()|@*"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="node()|@*" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="request-data"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*|node()" /> ${request data} <status>${progress status}</status> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="node()|@*"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="node()|@*" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="request-data"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*|node()" /> ${request data} <status>${progress status}</status> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="node()|@*"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="node()|@*" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="request-data"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*|node()" /> ${request data} <status>${progress status}</status> <status-reason> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Success</xsl:text> </status-reason> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="node()|@*"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="node()|@*" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="request-data"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:copy-of select="@*|node()" /> ${request data} </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
